address: Xã Cẩm Thành, Huyện Cẩm Xuyên, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
thought:
**Analysis of Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Cẩm Thành"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative unit for the old address "Xã Cẩm Thành, Huyện Cẩm Xuyên, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh." My process starts by breaking this down. First, I need to confirm the province, which is "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh." That's easy enough.

Next, I quickly check if "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh" is slated for any mergers or name changes. Looking at the province resolutions, specifically 60-NQ/TW, I see that "Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh" isn't listed for any such changes. Excellent. Its name remains the same.

Now, let's focus on the ward. I need to pinpoint the current "Xã Cẩm Thành."  I understand that I should use other resolutions for merging or changing the names of wards. Going into "Other resolutions," I find Resolution 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning the administrative re-organization of the province.  Line 4 explicitly mentions "Xã Cẩm Thành." Reading that line, I can see that "Xã Cẩm Thành" is merged into a new unit. According to the text, it will be merged with other communes into the new ward called "Xã Cẩm Bình."

I double-check to make sure. I scan to see if "Xã Cẩm Thành" is mentioned in the other part of the resolution, the part related to the merger with "Thị trấn Cẩm Xuyên", "xã Cẩm Quang" and "xã Cẩm Quan". I can confirm that this is not the case.

Finally, to verify the information, I check the "New wards" list for the relevant ward code and its province and I find: `{"ward_code":"18685","ward_name":"Xã Cẩm Bình","province_name":"Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh"}`. I can then use the ward code to find relevant administrative data.

Based on this direct match and the clear instruction in the resolution, I can say with high confidence that the administrative unit for the old address "Xã Cẩm Thành, Huyện Cẩm Xuyên, Tỉnh Hà Tĩnh" is now the new ward "Xã Cẩm Bình". This is definitive.

citation.header: 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hà Tĩnh
citation.line: 4. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Cẩm Vịnh, Thạch Bình,Cẩm Thành và Cẩm Bình thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Cẩm Bình**.
